Hi, I'm Daisy.

My BF used to make little games for me with quest before he went off to boarding school.  So I miss him and wanted to find some more games and i found ur site instead.

Reading this stuf reminds me of listening to him and his friend talking about games.

Anyhoo just wanted to say hi and you have a nice site
